words.def: free of extraneous elements of any kind
characterized by a lightly pert and exuberant quality
a domesticated animal kept for companionship or amusement
the option to sell a given stock (or stock index or commodity future) at a given price before a given date
place (flax, hemp, or jute) in liquid so as to promote loosening of the fibers from the woody tissue
a groove or furrow (especially one in soft earth caused by wheels)
European strong-scented perennial herb with grey-green bitter-tasting leaves
the 17th letter of the Hebrew alphabet
the local time at the 0 meridian passing through Greenwich, England
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
